attributes.action: make illegal the use of personnel music devices (mp3 players & the like) by cyclists on public roads & cycle paths that may be used by other users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The isolation effect of using these devices puts at risk the cyclist & the other road users.

Cyclists’ engrossed in their music are prone to making directional changes without perception of other traffic around them (in the form of audible cues) and thereby place themselves at risk of personal injury or possible death. The additional impact upon 3rd parties involved in any incident is not to be disregarded either.

Since use of a mobile phone is illegal while driving a car - not being fully aware of your environment should be illegal for cyclists.
